thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Sinnet Technology to acquire two firms for 2.9 bln yuan
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Beijing Sinnet Technology to acquire two firms for 2.9 bln yuan | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Beijing Sinnet Technology to acquire two firms for 2.9 bln yuan
text:
Sept 16 Beijing Sinnet Technology Co Ltd
* Says plans to acquire two technology firms for a combined 2.91 billion yuan ($456.87 million) via cash, share issue
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1UUibkc
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3694 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
